name: battery-passport-microservices
description: Microservices architecture for battery passport management

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:passport" "npm run dev:document" "npm run dev:notification"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd services/auth-service && npm install && cd ../passport-service && npm install && cd ../document-service && npm install && cd ../notification-service && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:auth && npm run test:passport && npm run test:document && npm run test:notification

author: Battery Passport Team
